turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to order a cinnamon shortbread latte from the Hilton Knoxville Starbucks in Knoxville, Tennessee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, at The Hill Starbucks at The Hill, Knoxville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think just a tall with whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And Can you have they do add a little bit more than normal amount of cinnamon on top or the cinnamon and nutmeg that they put on top of it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall cinnamon shortbread latte and whole milk with extra cinnamon and a little bit of whipped cream, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a tall cinnamon shortbread latte and whole milk with extra cinnamon and a little bit of whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks in hilton knoxville.
